solution_line_template: Goldie did pet-sitting for a total of {hours_last_week} + {hours_this_week} = <<{hours_last_week}+{hours_this_week}={total_hours_worked}>>{total_hours_worked} hours.
So, she earned a total of ${hourly_rate} x {total_hours_worked} = $<<{hourly_rate}*{total_hours_worked}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
